ovdesc.p: Internal balances file to hold contract wise provision balances.
Each provision movement are recorded in this file.

desc.p: Indicates the total provision amount for PROV.DATE. It is the sum of all PROV.MVMT field within the date.
Maximum of 15 Numeric characters.
Can hold Positive or Negative balance.
Indicates the Provision percentage that was applied during the current movement. Sub-value field to store Multiple movements on a single day.
Maximum of 11 Numeric characters.
Indicates the Date on which provision movement occurred. Dates would be stored in Chronological order with the most recent event at the bottom.
Standard date format of 11 characters
Indicates the provision movement amount during the provision date.
In case of Incremental provision this field will hold Positive amount.
Incase of Write-back (when the previously provisioned amount is higher than the current provision amount, the excess provision amount is credited back to PL), this field would hold Negative value
Maximum of 15 Numeric characters.
Can hold positive or Negative value.
Indicates the asset classification for this contract on the above mentioned date. Sub-value field to store multiple asset movements occurring on a single day.
Valid records in LN.ASSET.CLASS
Maximum of 3 Numeric characters.
Valid contract IDs of LD, MG and PD application.
Indicates the currency in which the Deal is denominated.
Standard currency field.
Maximum of 3 characters.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
Indicates the net amount provisioned for this contract. It is the sum of all TOT.MVMT fields.
Maximum of 11 Numeric characters.
Can hold Zero value.
